name: The White Square vs The Draganas
name_original: The White Square vs The Draganas
description:
Go off to the right to start --->>

Made for Weekly Game Jam #52 - "Boss Rush"

A rhythm game, a dodging game. Collect the keys and don't lose lives before the song runs out. Good luck catching the high score and enjoy the fruit salad... of death.

Programming & Animation by Meatpudding.
Music by Azemazer.
Additional assets by turkkub, perfect, Freepik.
